page.title: 04ADULT GROUPS IN SWINDERBY.
page.content: Ladies in Swinderby can meet their friends at the {Women's Fellowship }at the Methodist Church fortnightly on Tuesdays at 2.15pm. They have speakers on religion, travel, literature and crafts. Usually they sing 3 hymns, say a prayer,listen to a Bible reading and finish with tea, biscuits and a chat. The {Women's Institute} meets in the Village Hall monthly at 7.30pm. They begin by singing "Jerusalem". Recent subjects were Banking, Bee Keeping and History through Inn Signs. There are 29 members. Their drama group produces plays twice a year. The{Good Companions} has 56 members, all over 60 years.They meet monthly in the Village Hall for social activities and go on outings in the summer. The{Bowls Club}is for all ages. They have teams which are part of the Lincoln and Newark Leagues.
